abstract: On Oct. 3, 1990, West Germany and East Germany officially became one nation after 45 years of postwar division.
snippet: On Oct. 3, 1990, West Germany and East Germany officially became one nation after 45 years of postwar division.
lead_paragraph: On Oct. 3, 1990, West Germany and East Germany officially became one nation after 45 years of postwar division. The Oct. 3 New York Times reported, "Forty-five years after it was carved up in defeat and disgrace, Germany was reunited today in a midnight celebration of pealing bells, national hymns and the jubilant blare of good old German oom-pah-pah."

headline.main: Oct. 3, 1990 | East and West Germany United After 45 Years
